boardgame.name: Riff Raff
boardgame.description: A dexterity game where players take turning loading wooden _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;stuff_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; onto a swaying wooden ship. Bottles, sailors, rats and other cargo are placed on the body of the ship and three yardarms that protrude from the mast._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player has the same set of objects and a hand of cards numbered 1-10. Choose one card, then reveal it simultaneously with the other players. On your turn you place any piece you want onto the numbered space you chose. If the cargo is not balanced, the ship will sway to and fro, and one or more items may fall off the ship. If you tip pieces off the ship, you can save them by catching them, but whatever you don't catch is added to the pieces you need to get rid of. The first player to get rid of all his objects wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

RESERVED FOR iadrianik The game: Zoch (c) 2012. English, German, French and Italian rules included! All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
This game has been played only twice in an adult setting. BONUS: Includes additional counter-weight!
The game is still shrinwrapped. Comes from a smoke-free home.
Game: Riff Raff (Zoch) Condition: New Language: German, material language independent For information on payment, shipping and cancellation see below. Thanks in advance for ordering!
